entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Https CA certs reload every 5min in dotnet app running in Linux #93758
  • [WSL] Can't Spawn Window with Process.Start() #93755
  • [wasm] MeterDisposeTest is failing #93754
  • GC slows down use of multiple instances of LinkedList and SortedSet in parallel environment #93745
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http30.EventSource_ConnectionPoolAtMaxConnections_LogsRequestLeftQueue #93738
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.ConnectSync.ConnectGetsCanceledByDispose #93737
  • System.Runtime.Tests have 6 tests failing on my machine - daylight time #93736
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.TelemetryTest.EventSource_SocketConnectFailure_LogsConnectFailed #93735
  • .NET is twice slower than Java (in the nested loops benchmark) #93725
    Future
  • [H/3] Stress run in Debug fails on assert #93713
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.BinaryReaderTests #93743
  • 9 Regressions in PerfLabTests.GetMember #93741
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/int64/superlong/superlong_d/superlong_d.dll #93710

Closed

  • CultureInfo.GetCultures returns nothing on iOS platforms with HybridGlobalization enabled #93514
    8.0.0
  • FIleNotFoundException occurs #93747
  • [API Proposal]: Make String::FastAllocateString(int) public, or add a public proxy #93740
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.BindCanReadStaticProperty failing intermittently #86532
    Future
  • [mono][android] Failure in SourceGeneration.Unit.Tests #93592
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] CustomGeneratedAttributes test fails on linux-bionic #93723
    9.0.0
  • NotSupportedException trying to deserialize JSON in the "trim unused code" published app #93714
  • [Linux][P/Invoke] Corrupted memory? #93739
  • Native AOT (.NET 8.0) functions hook. (Native DLL Inject) #93730
  • Test failure System.Data.Tests.DataSetTypedDataSetTest.TypedDataSet #93271
  • Adding BigIntegers to collections causing synchronization issues inside runtime #93742
  • Use Improvements in CMake Generator Expressions to Simplify our Build System's ones #93370
    9.0.0
  • Can't build large webassembly project in .net8 in Release/AOT #92100
    8.0.0
  • [mono][hotreload] Add instance field #93036
    8.0.0
  • .NET Framework 4.8 Class Library compatibility issue with Azure.Storage.Blob package #93177
  • No Documentation for c# to wasm using Mono #42573
    Future
  • [wasm] wasmbrowser template is not trimmed on publish #93400
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP] Metrics test fails on Mac locally #91721
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Idea for a convenient Replace #93637
  • Consider providing nightly checked builds of CoreCLR #12419
    Future
  • Timeout on CurrentCulture_BasedOnLangEnvVar #93353
    9.0.0
  • GC Question: should we consider using `GC.Collect` in the library #93656

PullRequests

Created

  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93760
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Optimize JsonContent fast path #93759
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove cgroup PAL test #93757
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Test upgrading to ICU 72.3 #93756
    needs-area-label
  • Fix timezones test failures when having en-GB UI culture #93753
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization Get available locales #93751
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Update NotNullIfNotNull documentation #93750
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0] Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #93749
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0] Fix analysis of interface methods on generic types #93748
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Tensors backport #93746
    area-System.Numerics
  • Don't use File.OpenWrite when trying to overwrite a file #93744
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Test NFloat.IsNegative against its native type equivalent #93734
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Trim analyzer: Implement intrinsics handling of object.GetType #93732
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Disable CustomGeneratedAttributes test on linux-bionic #93724
    os-linux, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use live reference pack for IntrinsicsInSystemPrivatecorelibAnalyzer.Tests #93721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Disable failing runtime tests #93712
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Enable cgroups hierarchical memory limits support #93611
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData package readme #93660
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix Vector128 SIMD fmin and fmax #93677
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Provide Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions package readme #93653
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Memory.Data package readme #93516
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization Get available locales #93594
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fix race problem in configuration tests #93711
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Fix options source gen test #93709
    area-Extensions-Options, 9.0.0
  • Use the improved vectorization algorithm for aggregate TensorPrimitives operations #93695
    area-System.Numerics
  • Replaced CMake's Repeated CONFIG Expressions With Their Condensed Counterparts #93678
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: remove simple lowering #93704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [hot reload][debugger] Resolve field types before use #93558
    area-EnC-mono
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling - atttemp 2 #93648
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Stream remove the asserts #93715
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][jit] Partially implemented logical immediates on arm64 #93606
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix blazor startup measurements #93696
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove RequiresProcessIsolation from some loader tests #93654
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Improve literal-after-loop regex optimization #93190
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #93697
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression

Updated

  • Add native AOT cross build docs #93638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement the OleVariant struct, the OleVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #93707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #93706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: remove incorrect type deduction for an Unsafe.As case #93703
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline runs #93688
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Handle MultiRegNode in gtGetRegMask() #93576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Vectorizes IndexOfMin/Max/Magnitude #93469
    area-System.Numerics
  • Reference live ILLink analyzer #93259
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • KeyAnalyzer tests. #90301
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update MsQuic to 2.2.3 #93542
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Avoid extra `Array.Copy` in `List<T>.Insert(Range)` when the list is full #90089
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] NaN-box float arguments #93665
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #93662
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #88559
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Disable FastTailCall in case of split arg #93655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][amd64] Pass and return SIMD values in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • # I have a fix ! #36286
  • `dotnet workload update` doesn't list what it updated: "Successfully updated workload(s): ." #36278
  • Workload restore - support solution filters #36277
  • [workloads] dotnet verify fails on 7.0.401 on some Windows machines #36270

Closed

  • `dotnet list package` cannot resolve relative path #36254
  • SBRP System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager 7.0.0 missing public types #33388
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] GenAPI - Emit attribute type defines when excluded #36284
    Servicing-consider, Area-GenAPI, 8.0.1xx
  • [release/8.0.1xx] APICompat - Validate attribute type defines when excluded #36282
    Servicing-consider, Area-ApiCompat, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36280
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update 8.0.2xx for loc #35761
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable users to install unlisted version of tool if specify the exact match of the version of the tool #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [wasm] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #36253
    Servicing-approved, Area-WasmSdk, 8.0.1xx
  • Fix: Emit attribute type defines when excluded #36279
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix: Validate attribute type defines when excluded #36272
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add workload garbage collection tests for side-by-side manifests #35857
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix ASP.NET SDK test baseline generation when repo is part of a git worktree #36240
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #36094
    Area-WasmSdk, 9.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36189
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

    untriaged, Area-Common templates

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suspicious code in RuntimeCompatibilityWrapNonExceptionThrows property #70465
  • Use of InterceptsLocationAttribute should produce an error in VB #70461
  • EnableGenerateDocumentationFile analyzer is a breaking change #70460
    17.8
  • C# completion offered for explicit static interface method declaration generates code with several issues #70458
  • Obsolete PreserveLocalVariables #70450

Closed

  • CS1591 code fix should offer "<inheritdoc />" for explicit static interface method implementations #70456
  • VB Hot Reload bug #70198
    17.9
  • IDE0047 Needs better clarity for dotnet templates #70459
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34219.48 #70462
  • Interceptors feature doesn't work for VB - doc omission? gap? #70387
    17.9
  • Contract failure in AbstractPullDiagnosticHandler.GetIdToPreviousDiagnosticParams #66107
    17.9
  • Only suggestions for types are shown after typing `.` following `is SomeType` pattern #70226
  • Constant folding doesn't work correctly sometimes #70437
  • IDE0051 false positive #68162
  • Add Explicit Return Type in C# #67409

PullRequests

Created

  • Test CI with version only change #70471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test CI #70470
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add restricted IVT to Coplit Chat for code mapper service API #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Front load extract-method syntax and semantic checks. #70466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce the work done by remove unreachable analyzer when calculating diagnostics #70455
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Collection expressions: spread elements are not expressions #70417
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70463
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix incorrect contract in VB EnC analyzer #70464
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Update config file after 17.9 branch is created #70442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Filter completion list only with text before cursor #70448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix TriggerOnTyping to not block explicit invoking completion #70444
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • docs - note that interceptors are C# only #70457
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Prevent StringBuilder resizes during SyntaxNode.GetText #70447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Handle missing ISimplificationService implementation for non-C#/VB languages #70425
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, Next
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Clear 'run code analysis' results when a build completes #70412
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add refactoring to convert a primary-constructor-parameter to a normal constructor. #70399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Ensure the VSCode server process runs on non-preview runtime #70446
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Update ExternalAccess for EditorConfig #70415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure bulk included diagnostic IDs for Code cleanup only fix Warning/Error diagnostics #70353
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • bool IDataProtector.TryUnprotect() #51508
  • Simplify WebAssembly hot reload capabilities detection #51507
  • Perf regression: fortunes #51505
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #51504
  • Blazor add auto generated management screens for Application user role and claim Management pages #51503
  • StreamRendering(true) isn't working correctly with default blazor web app template on rc2 #51502
  • Add async support to form validation with EditContext on submit #51501
  • RC2 Blazor Web App template nits and inconsistencies #51495
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor Server in .NET 8 preview 7 not working when published for Linux #51493
  • [SignalR] When testing end-to-end in Github Workflow, sometimes a client may not receive a message #51492
  • Perf regression: single_query #51487
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, single_query, updates #51486
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #51485
  • WebApplicationFactory with no <T> auto uses Program.cs in a minimal api #51484

Closed

  • Blazor Web Individual Account Template does not have the Logout form handler #51489
  • .NET 8 RC2 crashes when using HttpLoggingMiddleware after upgrading from RC1 #51322
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor WebApp.Client error adding feature management package #51499
  • Hot Reload Support For Blazor #51211
    8.0.x
  • Several issues with Kestrel header processing. #51467
  • Multiple connections to _blazor #51299
  • Page is created twice on refresh in Blazor Server #51500
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #51496
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #51488
  • Blazor Identity with Global RenderMode #51476
  • Why is RequireAuthorization not working on minimal endpoint? #51483
  • Blazor Server - ILogger is not logging to browser dev tools console #51424
  • New Identity login endpoint does not honor 'X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest' header #50010
  • `onclick` Event Fails in `nav.razor` Component After Adding `hero.razor` Component when Using Arbitrary Values in Class Attributes #50497

PullRequests

Created

  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51498
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Blazor template bug where a logged in user could appear to be unauthenticated #51497
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Remove duplicate .sln from Blazor Web Template WebAssembly and Auto #51494
    area-blazor, feature-templates, 8.0.x
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • 51322: parameterless `AddHttpLogging` #51506
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Use C# 12's collection expressions #51378
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Weather.razor to simplify [StreamRendering] attribute usage. #51477
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 6.0.25 #51478
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • Update branding to 7.0.14 #51479
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Quarantine ResponseTests.HttpsConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #51369
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve MultipartReader performance #51426
    Perf, area-networking
  • Dispose secret instances #51253
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Update Selenium versions #50809
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Remove network.protocol.name from request duration metric #51456
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] Skip failing template tests on Win11-arm64 #51311
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Respect "grpc-status-details-bin" trailer on error response #51394
    area-grpc, community-contribution
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Disable page command buttons #18169
  • Topmost Page #18168
  • Facing issue with firebase bitcode:App store denied my app show following error #18162
  • Toggling FlyoutLayoutBehavior on Android causes the app to crash #18161
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.0] Label measuring seems to break the parent layout width #18160
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI - Redirecting to AppShell page throws "Can not perform this action after onsaveinstancestate" exception #18159
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage does not respond to changes in the FlyoutLayoutBehavior property #18158
    Backlog
  • DisplayActionSheet doesn't show up on macOS #18156
    Backlog
  • Random crashes on iOS when navigating #18153
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] shell doesn't navigate to bottom tabs from subpage #18135
    Backlog
  • [iOS, Mac, Windows] Color changes are not reflected in the Rectangle shapes #18131
    .NET 8 GA
  • [WinUI MAUI8] Incorrect size of first item with Border in CollectionView #18128
    .NET 8 GA
  • Editor control Text color is not updated properly on Windows platform #18127
    Backlog
  • MAUI When clicking blank and the keyboard is hidden, Entry does not have corresponding processing events And Xamarin can handle. #18125
    Backlog
  • MAUI application shows the telemetry log as XAMARIN APP #18124
  • MultiBinding Throwing Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #18123
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Windows App SDK code and user confirm method is correct to set WriteableBitmap pixels and working in Windows SDK but this is broken and does not work in Maui? Maui specific issue? #18164
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] Windows CollectionView is displayed as Grid Layout even if it should be List if initially the collectionView is not visible #17400
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] TapGestureRecognizers do not work with static methods #18165
    .NET 8 GA
  • No working method for setting BitmapImage/BitmapSource/SoftwareBitmap/WriteableBitmap pixels??? #18129
  • [MAUI8] Line is not showing #18136
    .NET 8 GA
  • .Net8 Regression - Button background does not override implicit visualstate style #18103
    .NET 8 GA
  • [NET 8.0 ANDROID] Custom ScrollView BindableProperty Not Getting Set #18142

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Update versions #18167
  • [Templates] Fix template typo #18166
    area/templates 📄
  • [net7.0] Fix iOS tests net7 #18163
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #18145
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #18141
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect SQL for Any() with predicate that contains comparison with null #32103
  • Why does EF Core try to create objects that are not present in the class? REOPEN #32101
  • Migration Generation Fails With Method Not Found Exception #32100
  • Problem with proper configuration database with EF core 7 using UTC dates #32097
  • The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit. #32093
  • Dynamic OR predicate on multiple columns #32092
  • ToHashSet not being translated when using OData #32090

Closed

  • EF Core and using reflections #32078
  • INNER JOIN instead of LEFT JOIN #32075
  • Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31961
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Fix to #32062 - Altering a nullable column to not null generates invalid SQL commands for migration #32102
  • Change IStateManager.StartTrackingFromQuery to use ISnapshot instead of ValueBuffer #32099
  • [main] Fix to #32023 - Case expressions may only be nested to level 10 when using SplitQuery() or ToList() inside projection. #32094

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #31961 - Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31996
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Update implicit version for November #17590
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #17587
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #17586

Merged

  • License scan updates #17561

  • Re-enable dotnet-format tests on Alpine #17582
  • Disable source build for PR and CI on non-1xx branches #17578
  • This is the dependency flow of the .net 9 SDK and arcade update #17524
  • Disable source build xml doc test #17579
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Include full path in poison report #17580

Updated

  • Poison current SBRP #17339
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Use symbolic links instead of hard links in runtime pack directories. #17534
    Servicing-consider, Area-SourceBuild
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17482
  • Update source build pipeline triggers #17547
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Fix minimum macOS version in the .pkg manifest #17480
